name: Xing Hu 0008
content: Xing Hu’s Home Page | Xing Hu’s Home Page About Me I am an associate professor at school of software technology, Zhejiang University(ZJU). I got my Ph.D degree in July 2020 from School of Electronics Engineering and Computer Science (EECS), Peking University, China. I was very fortunate to work under the supervision of Prof. Zhi Jin and Prof. Ge Li. My research mainly focuses on software engineering, such as AI for SE, mining software repositories, etc. Education & Employment Associate professor 2023.1 - Present Zhejiang University, China Assistant professor 2020.07 - 2022.12 Zhejiang University, China PhD in Computer Software and Theory, Advisors: Zhi Jin, Ge Li 2015.9 - 2020.7 Peking University
